DevBoxDefinitionName.description: The name of the Dev Box definition.

FilterParameter.name: $filter
FilterParameter.description: The filter to apply to the operation. Example: '$filter=contains(name,'myName').

OperationIdParameter.name: operationId
OperationIdParameter.description: The ID of an ongoing async operation

EnvironmentDefinitionNameParameter.description: The name of the Environment Definition.

ImageDefinitionNameParameter.description: The name of the Image Definition.

ImageDefinitionBuildNameParameter.name: buildName
ImageDefinitionBuildNameParameter.description: The ID of the Image Definition Build.
